page.title: 03SUB POST OFFICE
page.content: Bassingham{Sub Post Office. ------------------------------------- Bassingham{Sub Post Office }is an important means of{Communication}. Letters and parcels are delivered to 615 houses in this area and that to the south of us.The letters are sorted by hand each morning.The{Delivery {Officers}then deliver them to the houses.Letters,for delivery elsewhere, are collected from the{Post Boxes}in the morning and evening.These letters, together with any parcels from the Sub Post Office,are taken to Lincoln for sorting.Letters and parcels need a stamp,which can be purchased from the Sub Post Office. The Sub Post Office has been on it's present site for 14 years. Previous sites have been at Green's Stores and at Witham House. --------------------------------------
